question: Who inaugurates Bihar's first 'Startup hub' in Patna?
explanation: Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Sushil Kumar Modi inaugurated the first 'Startup hub' of Bihar in Patna. Sushil Kumar Modi said that, work station and office space along with free of cost "plug and play" facility will be offered to 31 startup companies in the startup hub. He said that, the startup hub will be developed as a common facility centre. He also said that, policy and structural reforms to encourage IT enable services and ESDM (Electronics System Design and Manufacturing) in Bihar had been recently initiated.
